summary: Two teenagers fall in love over the summer, in spite of cynical and disapproving adults who dismiss their relationship as being nothing but young love.
cast: Ann-Sofie Kylin|Rolf Sohlman|Anita Lindblom|Bertil Norström|Lennart Tellfelt|Margreth Weivers|Arne Andersson|Maud Backéus|Verner Edberg|Tommy Nilson|Gunnar Ossiander|Elsie Holm|Gunvor Tännérus|Lennart Tollén|Björn Andrésen|Christer Hellquist|Birger Carlsson|Roger Magnusson|Jan Olsson|Nils Söderlund|Lisbeht Tammeleht|Lotta Wallin|Helen Andersson|Lennart Engkvist|Erik Hansson|Harald Jens|Ingvar Lagergren|Dagfin Malm|Rune Svensson|Dagmar Sverák|Wiveka Alexandersson|Walter Hirsch|Raymond Johansson|Rose Lagercrantz|Sol Britt Pilotti|Staffan Stenström|Dagmar Svensson|Lars Wiik
title: Una historia sueca de amor
